summary: This code defines a class called AsyncMutableArray that provides thread-safe operations for a mutable array, preventing crashes during multi-threaded usage. It includes methods for basic array manipulation and enumeration, as well as thread-safe iterations using block syntax.

details.comment: This code defines a class called AsyncMutableArray that provides thread-safe operations for a mutable array, preventing crashes during multi-threaded usage. It includes methods for basic array manipulation and enumeration, as well as thread-safe iterations using block syntax.
